Module edu.citadel.compiler
Package edu.citadel.compiler

Class AbstractToken<Symbol extends java.lang.Enum<Symbol>>

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.compiler.AbstractToken<Symbol>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Token, Token
public abstract class AbstractToken<Symbol extends java.lang.Enum<Symbol>>
extends java.lang.Object
This class encapsulates the properties of a language token. A token consists of a Symbol (a.k.a., the Token type), a Position, and a String that contains the text of the token.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    AbstractToken​(Symbol symbol, Position position, java.lang.String text)
    Constructs a new Token with the given symbol, position, and text.
